Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>.
Are you awake?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
It seems that you have completed all
the work on Town Restoration 2.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone in town came together to
express our appreciation.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's amazing how you were able to look
at my blueprint and build everything
perfectly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>You should quit that farm of yours and
go into carpentry!
You could do well in that line of work!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
More people have moved to town and
things have become livelier!
<PAGE>
Living here is more fun now than when I
first moved in.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And my work is much easier now!
Since you built me such a great house!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not one to give praise lightly,
but you are really doing a good job.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Not bad.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
As you can see, everyone in town is
grateful for what you're doing.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And now...
people are talking about making our town
even more lively, by expanding it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the old days this town was bigger,
but people moved away and the land
reverted to wilderness.
<PAGE>
Now people are starting to reclaim that
land. They've been working hard to
prepare the ground.
<PAGE>
We kept it a secret from you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm sorry I kept you in the dark!
<PAGE>
But you've been building the town and
working your farm all at the same time!
<PAGE>
We couldn't ask you to help with this,
too. And people also wanted to do
something for you in return.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And today, the land clearing is done!
<PAGE>
I'd like to show the area to you.
Can you come with me now?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, let's go.
The new area is to the left of the
current town. We'll be there in no time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha!
How about that? Isn't it marvelous?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad to see it pleases you!
And now I have this to give you.
<PAGE>
It's a new town restoration plan
that everyone pitched in to write.

<SPEED_IMME>
　　　Acquired <RED>Town Restoration 3</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now we can put this new land to good
use and further develop our town!
<PAGE>
Everyone is confident that you're the
person who can get it done!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I think I'll be heading home.
We're counting on you, <MYNAME>.

This is a town restoration plan that
everybody worked on!
I'll complete it no matter what!

Check the details of the plan from the
<RED>menu</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We're standing in about the middle of
the new land now.
Take a look to your right.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This entrance leads to the current town.
You can check it out for yourself later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And there is one more entrance.
Look behind you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That entrance leads to the forest.
You can also check that out later.
Nice, isn't it?
